snippet: The tornado, one of four that touched down in the area, caused a chemical leak but no immediate reports of injuries.
abstract: One of four tornadoes sweeping Texas hits Halliburton plant in Amarillo, Tex, causing chemical leak; authorities say emergency crews are trying to contain leak and no injuries have been reported.
lead_paragraph: The tornado, one of four that touched down in the area, caused a chemical leak but no immediate reports of injuries.

headline.main: Texas: Tornado Rips Through Halliburton Plant
headline.print_headline: Texas: Tornado Rips Through Halliburton Plant
